node.name: Swarovski CL Companion 8x30 Binoculars (Green)
node.short_description: The new Swarovski CL Companion 8×30 binoculars have a 132 m (144yd) field of view to give you the perfect overview.
node.description:
The new Swarovski CL Companion 8x30 binoculars have a 132 m (144yd) field of view to give you the perfect overview. Its impressive optics with 8x magnification ensure your viewing is smooth and jitter-free. The ergonomic design of these compact, lightweight (490 g/17.2 oz) binoculars makes them an excellent companion providing you with unique experiences when you’re on the move.

 

 

Swarovski CL Companion 8x30 Technical Data:

Magnification 8
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 30
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 3.8
Exit pupil distance (eye relief) (mm) 16
Field of view (ft/1000 yds / m/1000 m) 396/132
Field of view (degrees) 7.6
Field of view for eyeglass wearers (degrees) 7.6
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 58
Shortest focusing distance (ft / m) 9.8/3
Dioptric compensation (dpt) ± 4
Diopter correction at ∞ (dpt) >5
Light transmission (%) 90
Pupil distance (in / mm) 2.2-2.9 / 55-74
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 15.5

node.name: Swarovski CL Pocket 8x25 Binoculars (Green)
node.short_description: The Swarovski CL Pocket 8×25 are foldable compact binoculars of exceptional optical quality.
node.description:
The Swarovski CL Pocket 8x25 are foldable compact binoculars of exceptional optical quality.

They offer optimum viewing comfort, even during long observation periods, and are easy to use. Even eyeglass wearers can fully benefit from the large field of view (357 ft/119 m) thanks to the individually adjustable twist-in eyecups.

nbsp;

Swarovski CL Pocket 8x25 Technical Data:

Magnification 8x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 25
Exit pupil diameter (in/mm) 0.12/3.1
Exit pupil distance (eye relief) (in/mm) 0.67/17
Field of view (ft/1000 yds / m/1000 m) 357/119
Field of view (degrees) 6.8
Field of view for eyeglass wearers (degrees) 6.8
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 52
Shortest focusing distance (ft/m) 8.2/2.5
Dioptric compensation (dpt) ± 5
Diopter correction at ∞ (dpt) 6
Light transmission (%) 88
Pupil distance (in/mm) 2.0-2.9/50-74
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 14.2

node.name: Swarovski EL 10x42 HD Binoculars
node.short_description: The Swarovski EL 10×42 HD binoculars combine size, weight, and optical performance to give the perfect product.
node.description:
The Swarovski EL 10x42 HD binoculars combine size, weight, and optical performance to give the perfect product.

They are multipurpose and reliable, suitable for use both during the day and at twilight. Nature lovers appreciate the unique close-up setting of 1.5 m and the rapid, precise focusing mechanism.

EL 10x42 HD binoculars capture the crucial details with their 10x magnification. Ideal for observing over long distances.

 

 

Swarovski EL 10x42 HD Binoculars Techincal Data:

Magnification 10x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 42
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 4.2
Exit pupil distance (eye relief) (mm) 20
Field of view (ft/1000 yds / m/1000 m) 336/112
Field of view (degrees) 6.4
Field of view for eyeglass wearers (degrees) 6.4
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 60
Shortest focusing distance (ft / m) 4.9/1.5
Dioptric compensation (dpt) ± 5
Diopter correction at ∞ (dpt) 8
Light transmission (%) 90
Pupil distance (in / mm) 2.2-2.9 / 56-74
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 20.5

node.name: Swarovski EL 10x42 Range Binoculars
node.short_description: The Swarovski EL 10×42 Range binoculars offer the best combination of long-range optics and ergonomic design.
node.description:
The Swarovski EL 10x42 Range offers the best combination of long-range optics and ergonomic design.

The master craftsmanship underlying these binoculars is proven by razor-sharp images combined with precise range and angle measurement, as well as their perfectly balanced weight, allowing you to hold them steady.

Other benefits of the new EL Range are the FieldPro package, which includes a new strap connector making it extremely simple to switch quickly and flexibly between strap and accessories and the new, distinctive measurement button.

 

 

EL 10x42 Range Technical Data

Magnification 8x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 42
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 5.3
Exit pupil distance (eye relief) (mm) 19.2
Field of view (ft/1000 yds / m/1000 m) 411/137
Field of view (degrees) 7.8
Field of view for eyeglass wearers (degrees) 7.8
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 61
Shortest focusing distance (ft / m) 16.4 / 5
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -7/+5
Light transmission (%) 91
Pupil distance (in / mm) 2.2 - 2.9 / 56 - 74
Twilight factor acc. to DIN 58388 18.3

node.name: Swarovski EL 8x42 Range Binoculars
node.short_description: Accuracy can also mean versatility. The Swarovski EL Range 8×42 binoculars are ideal for numerous viewing opportunities right up to twilight.
node.description:
Accuracy can also mean versatility. The Swarovski EL 8x42 Range binoculars are ideal for numerous viewing opportunities right up to twilight. They provide an expansive field of view and large exit pupil to ensure optimum comfort during observation.

Thanks to the new FieldPro package, the EL Range 8x42 will also impress with their enhanced strap connector, integrated objective lens and eyepiece covers, as well as the new, distinctive measurement button for even more precise operation.

 

 

Swarovski EL 8x42 Range Techincal Data:

Magnification 8x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 42
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 5.3
Exit pupil distance (eye relief) (mm) 19.2
Field of view (ft/1000 yds / m/1000 m) 411 / 137
Field of view (degrees) 7.8
Field of view for eyeglass wearers (degrees) 7.8
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 61
Shortest focusing distance (ft / m) 16.4 / 5
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -7/+5
Light transmission (%) 91
Pupil distance (in / mm) 2.2 - 2.9 / 56 - 74
Twilight factor acc. to DIN 58388 18.3

node.name: Swarovski SLC 8x56 Binoculars
node.short_description: The SLC 56 binoculars from Swarovski Optic provide you with optimum support whatever the situation.
node.description:
Hunting at dawn and dusk and over long distances poses particular challenges for both hunters and technology. The Swarovski SLC 56 binoculars provide you with optimum support whatever the situation.

These binoculars stand out thanks to their excellent HD optics for twilight use, which provide impressive edge-to-edge sharpness. Excellent viewing comfort is ensured by the perfectly balanced weight and extended depressions that provide a good, steady grip and prevent any feeling of fatigue when observing for hours on end.

 

 

Swarovski Optik SLC 8x56 Binoculars Technical Data:

Magnification 8
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 56
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 7
Exit pupil distance (eye relief) (mm) 23
Field of view (ft/1000 yds / m/1000 m) 400/133
Field of view (degrees) 7.6
Field of view for eyeglass wearers (degrees) 7.6
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 60
Shortest focusing distance (ft / m) 12.8/3.9
Dioptric compensation (dpt) ± 4
Diopter correction at ∞ (dpt) 5
Light transmission (%) 93
Pupil distance (in/mm) 2.2-3.0/56-76
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 21.2

node.name: Swarovski X5 5-25x56 1/8 MOA PLEX Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Swarovski X5 25×56 Rifle Scope provides precise 1/8 MOA impact point adjustment, combined with the fine PLEX reticle, allows you to hit every target accurately.
node.description:
The Swarovski X5 25x56 Rifle Scope provides precise 1/8 MOA impact point adjustment, combined with the fine PLEX reticle, allows you to hit every target accurately, even at the maximum distance.

 

 

X5 5-25X56 1/8MOA PLEX Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 5-25x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 48.0-56
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 9.5-2.3
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 21-4.5 / 7-1.5
Field of view (degrees) 4.0-0.8
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 21.1
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 90
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 15.5-37.4
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.13 / 3.6
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 86.4/54 / 2.4/1.5
Impact point corr. per click (MOA) 1/8
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (MOA) 82/50
Elevation/windage impact point correction per rotation (clicks) 100/90
Option to go below sight-in distance SUBZERO (clicks) 80
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 58x0.75

node.name: Swarovski Z6i 1-6x24 CD-I Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The outstanding field of view offered by the Z6i 1-6×24 from Swarovski Optik gives you the edge over others and aids target acquisition. For example, in narrow forest pathways, you can identify your target quickly and accurately
node.description:
The outstanding field of view offered by the Swarovski Z6i 1-6x24 Rifle Scope gives you the edge over others and aids target acquisition. In narrow forest pathways, you can identify your target quickly and accurately. The 6x magnification means that you are also perfectly equipped for medium distances.

The illuminated Z6i 1-6x24 stands out thanks to its 127.5 ft / 42.5 m field of view with a 1x magnification, which provides a larger overview when hunting. The 6x zoom provides the finest detail.

 

Swarovski Optik Z6i 1-6X24 CD-I Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 1-6x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 9.6-24
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 9.6-4.0
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 127.5-20.4 / 42.5-6.8
Field of view (degrees) 23.8-3.9
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 23.4
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 90
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 2.8-12
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.54 / 15
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 72 / 2
Objective filter thread M 27x0.75

node.name: Swarovski Z6i 2-12x50 4A-300 Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Z6i 2-12×50 from Swarovski Optik is for hunters who want to cover every eventuality when out hunting, a reliable twilight scope or for taking long-range shots in the field.
node.description:
The Swarovski Z6i 2-12x50 is for hunters who want to cover every eventuality when out hunting, the Z6i 2-12x50 is a reliable twilight scope that can handle hunting in the forest as well as taking long-range shots in the field or across plains. This is possible thanks to the field of view and high magnification.

 

Swarovski Optik Z6I 2-12X50 Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 2-12x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 19.3-50
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 9.6-4.2
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 63-10.5 / 21.0-3.5
Field of view (degrees) 11.8-1.95
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 23.4
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 90
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 5.7-24.6
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 54 / 1.5
Objective filter thread M 52x0.75

node.name: Swarovski Z6i 2.5-15x56 (BT) 4A Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The illuminated Z6i 2.5-15×56 P BT rifle scope from Swarovski Optik provides HD optics and lateral parallax correction, guaranteeing a faultless image.
node.description:
The illuminated Swarovski Z6i 2.5-15x56 (BT) 4A Rifle Scope is intended for hunting in poor light conditions.

The 6x zoom scope offers an effective range of use with a field of view suitable for hunting to a 15x magnification, which is of great benefit particularly for accurate long-range shots.

HD optics and lateral parallax correction guarantee you a faultless image.

 

 

Swarovski Z6i 2.5-15x56 (BT) 4A Technical Data:

Magnification 2.5-15x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 24.0-56
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 9.5-3.8
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 49.5-8.1 / 16.5-2.7
Field of view (degrees) 9.4-1.5
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 23.2
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 91
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 7.1-29
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 64.8-36 / 1.8-1
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 58x0.75

node.name: Swarovski Z6i 3-18x50 ILL (BT) 4A Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Z6I 3-18X50 ILL (BT) 4A rifle scope from Swarovski Optik with 18x magnification is clearly intended for distant targets. The Z6i 3-18×50 (BT) offers you the assurance of a large field of view
node.description:
The Swarovski Z6I 3-18X50 ILL (BT) 4A rifle scope with 18x magnification is clearly intended for distant targets.

The Z6i 3-18x50 (BT) offers you the assurance of a large field of view, providing HD optics and lateral parallax correction, this scope is intended for long-range shooting. The fine illuminated reticle of this scope is perfect for accurate shooting at twilight.

 

 

Swarovski Optik Z6I 3-18X50 ILL (BT) 4A Technical Data:

Magnification 3-18x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 29.0-50
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 9.5-2.8
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 39.9-6.6 / 13.3-2.2
Field of view (degrees) 7.6-1.3
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 22.8
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 90
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 8.5-30
Impact point corr. per click elevation / windage (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36/10 / 0.18/5
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 64.8-36 / 1.8-1
Parallax correction (yds / m) 55-∞ / 50-∞
Objective filter thread M 52x0.75

node.name: Swarovski Z8i 0.75-6x20 LD-I Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Z8I 0.75-6X20 LD-I Rifle Scope from Swarovski Optik is designed for driven hunts, the Z8i 0.75-6×20 L with 8x zoom means you never miss any of the action.
node.description:
The Swarovski Z8I 0.75-6x20 LD-I Rifle Scope is designed for driven hunts, with 8x zoom you will never miss any of the action.

Thanks to VIEWPLUS 0.75x magnification this rifle scope offers 30% more field of view. The D-I reticle has been reduced to a single point of focus to enable an unobscured view of the target.

The CLICKONE function has a tangible click so that you know when you have reached 1x magnification. You can also customise the light to suit your particular hunting needs with our range of top-quality accessories.

 

 

Swarovski Optik Z8I 0.75-6X20 LD-I Rifle Scope Technical Data:

Magnification 0.75-6x
Effective objective lens diameter (mm) 6.3-20
Exit pupil diameter (mm) 8.1-3.2
Exit pupil distance (mm) (Eye relief) 95
Field of view (ft/100 yds / m/100 m) 168.0-21.0 / 56.0-7.0
Field of view (degrees) 31.0-4.0
Field of view, apparent (degrees) 24
Dioptric compensation (dpt) -3 to +2
Light transmission (%) 93
Twilight factor acc. to ISO 14132-1 2.1-11.0
Impact point corr. per click (in/100 yds / mm/100 m) 0.36 / 10
Max. elevation / windage adjustment range (in/100 yds / m/100 m) 72 / 2
Objective filter thread M 27x0.75
